name: Trex Runner 3D
description:
This is a fan made version of the classic T-Rex Runner game on Google Chrome made in 3D on Unreal Engine 4 in 2-3 days. 

The controls are the same as in the original game. You can jump with the w key, Space or the up key and control your height jump by how long you press the button. You can also crouch and fall faster by pressing the down key.

So try it if you want, and if you do, tell me in the comments what do you think about it and most importantly, tell us your highscore ! 😉
